German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Compound of kühl "cool" + Schrank "cabinet".

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈkyːlˌʃʀaŋk/
  • audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Kühlschrank m (genitive Kühlschrankes or Kühlschranks, plural Kühlschränke)

  1. refrigerator

Declension[edit]

1Now uncommon, see notes

Hyponyms[edit]

  • Tiefkühlschrank (“deep freezer”)

Related terms[edit]

  • Kühlfach
  • Kühlregal
  • Küchenschrank
